__TOC__

* First report since <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WisconsinTeam/TeamReports/09/December|December 2009]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WisconsinTeam|Contact information]]</nowiki> is current.

* No meetings this month. Most activity is in the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-wi|mailing list]]</nowiki>. The <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-us-wi|irc channel]]</nowiki> is still open and monitored by members, but currently has little activity.

* Events: Madison Ubuntu Hour on June 18, hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>. The next Madison Ubuntu Hour will be July 16.

* We welcome new members. Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-Wisconsin|Launchpad Team]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-wi|mailing list]]</nowiki>, and get involved!
